title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your feelings are inclined to magnify or distort whatever you experience today. For instance, you might taste a new ice cream flavor, only to fall in love with it. The truth is, even if its delicious, its not the best ice cream in the history of humankind. Although you may want everyone to know about your amazing discovery, save this kind of enthusiasm for marketing purposes. Temper your extreme response now, positive or negative, to regain a rational perspective. Author Edward Abbey wrote, Balance, thats the secret. Moderate extremism. The best of both worlds. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
